longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 3 months from the arrival date. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of British passports;
Minors:
- Passengers of up to and including 15 years of age can enter
  with any identity document with a photo. 
Additional Information:
- A max. stay of 90 days is granted within 6 months to holders
  of British passports; 



 Moldova (Rep
